title: Parameterize tunnel wait timeout
description: systemeval/systemeval/cli.py hardcodes  and the surrounding tunnel logic binds to a single magic value. This violates basic design principles—these waits should be driven by config defaults or CLI flags (with doc mention) to avoid needing code changes for environment differences.

title: [EPIC] Multi-Project Support for SystemEval
Fix CLI tests after cli.py rename (3 failures)
description:
CLI tests failing after cli.py -> cli_main.py rename.

Failures:
- 3 tests in tests/test_cli.py
- Issues: AttributeError in test command, env mode detection

Specific tests:
- test_test_no_config - AttributeError
- test_test_with_json_output - AttributeError
- test_env_mode_auto_calls_get_environment_type
- test_env_mode_docker_skips_detection
- test_env_mode_local_skips_detection

Root cause: Import changes from cli.py -> cli_main.py

Fix needed:
- Verify all CLI imports are updated correctly
- Check if any internal CLI references need updating
- Ensure cli_main module exports all expected functions
- Update test mocks if needed
close_reason: Fixed all 3 CLI test failures by updating patch decorators from systemeval.cli to systemeval.cli_main

title: Decompose Environment Executor
description: systemeval/systemeval/environments/executor.py is over 1500 lines and combines CLI flags, docker orchestration, tunnel handling, and result aggregation. This sprawling file breaks SRP and makes it hard to reason about environment lifecycle. Split it into dedicated orchestrators/services (docker control, lifecycle state machine, result reporting) to keep architecture clean.

title: Fix E2E validation tests after restructure (28 failures)
description:
E2E validation tests failing after repository restructure.

Failures:
- 28 tests in tests/test_e2e_validation.py
- Issues: Validation logic not finding expected methods
- Root cause: Import path issues after e2e/validation/ reorganization

Categories affected:
- TestValidateRequiredFields (4 failures)
- TestValidatePaths (8 failures)
- TestValidateUrls (9 failures)
- TestValidateTimeouts (7 failures)
- TestValidateTestFramework (7 failures)

Fix needed:
- Check import paths in e2e/validation modules
- Verify composite_validator.py imports correctly
- Update backward compatibility shims for validation classes
- Ensure all validators are properly exported from e2e/validation/

title: Plan debugg-ai CLI support for Next.js sample
Implement SystemEval Next.js sample + integration docs
description: Build or enhance the Next.js sample app plus INTEGRATION.md so systemeval e2e/crawl and Debugg-AI CLI flows have a concrete sandbox to target.

title: Create shared Node.js adapter base class
description: VitestAdapter, JestAdapter, PlaywrightAdapter share npm/npx patterns. Extract NodeAdapterBase with common npm install detection, npx execution, JSON parsing.

title: Consolidate CLI option transformation logic
description: Test command has 15+ options across 5 dataclasses. Option transformation scattered in _run_browser_tests(), _run_with_environment(). Create unified command builder pattern.

title: Implement CLI --tags and --exclude-tags flags
description: Filter subprojects by tags defined in config. --tags=unit runs only subprojects with unit tag, --exclude-tags=e2e skips those tagged e2e.

title: Document design rules + crawl/E2E API reference
description: Record the design requirements, crawl/E2E API shapes, and auth steps so engineers have a single reference before editing CLI or sample code.

title: Add JestAdapter for TypeScript/JavaScript
description: New adapter for Jest framework: npx jest --json, coverage support. Consider shared base with VitestAdapter for common Node.js patterns.

title: Define exit code behavior for multi-project runs
description: Exit 0 if all pass/skip, exit 1 if any fail, exit 2 for config errors. Document behavior clearly.

title: Create BaseJavaScriptAdapter to eliminate Jest/Vitest duplication
description:
Jest and Vitest adapters have nearly identical structure:
- jest_adapter.py: 428 lines, 1 class, 9 methods
- vitest_adapter.py: 412 lines, 1 class, 9 methods

Both implement identical patterns:
- discover_tests() - same logic, different JSON parsing
- run_tests() - same execution strategy  
- parse_output() - nearly identical regex patterns

Extract shared logic into BaseJavaScriptAdapter with:
- Shared npm/npx detection
- Shared execution patterns
- Shared JSON output parsing
- Make jest/vitest thin subclasses that just configure test_command and json_reporter

Related to systemeval-3hp (create shared Node.js adapter base class).
close_reason: Completed as part of Phase 2 refactoring (adapters and e2e reorganization)

title: Establish test coverage baseline and targets
description: Measure current coverage, set targets for new code (80%+). Configure coverage reporting in CI. Identify untested critical paths.

title: Implement pre_commands execution for subprojects
description: Execute pre_commands (npm install, pip install) before running subproject tests. Handle failures gracefully, report in results.

title: Fix debugg-ai CLI integration issues
Test sample + Debugg-AI CLI interactions
description: Run systemeval crawl/e2e plus Debugg-AI CLI commands against the sample to validate the workflows and log any blockers.

title: Add backward compatibility tests for v1.0 configs
description: Ensure existing single-project systemeval.yaml files continue to work. Test migration warnings, auto-upgrade suggestions.

description:
E2E storage tests failing after repository restructure with AttributeError issues.

Failures:

Categories affected:

title: Implement debugg-ai CLI updates for Next.js sample
Add tests for aggregated reporting output
description: Test Rich table output format, JSON output schema, total calculations, verdict logic.

title: Add systemeval list command for subprojects
description: New CLI command to list configured subprojects with adapter, path, enabled status, and tags. Table output via Rich.

title: Create test fixtures for multi-project scenarios
description: Fixtures with mock subprojects: pytest, vitest, playwright. Include pass/fail/skip scenarios. Temporary directory structure generation.

title: Review config.py complexity (17K LOC)
description: config.py is 17,228 LOC with 13 Pydantic models and complex discriminated unions. Evaluate splitting into config/schemas.py, config/validation.py, config/loading.py.

title: Create SystemEval Mission Statement and Documentation
description:
PREREQUISITE for all architecture work: Document why SystemEval exists and what it does.

**Core Mission:**
SystemEval enables systematic testing of every piece of your application - old tools (pytest, jest, playwright) PLUS new AI-powered capabilities via DebuggAI integration:

**Traditional Testing:**
- Unified CLI for pytest, jest, vitest, playwright, etc.
- Multi-project orchestration
- Environment management (docker, standalone, browser)
- Structured JSON output for CI/CD

**DebuggAI Integration (CORE FOCUS):**
- Natural language test generation: 'create tests for homepage'
- Commit-based test generation: analyze git diffs
- Knowledge graph generation of your app
- Instant feedback on page failures
- Chrome failure logs and screenshots
- Crawl sessions to map your application

**Key Value:**
Instant feedback loop - run traditional tests, generate new tests from changes, get visual failure reports, understand app structure through knowledge graphs.

**Tasks:**
1. Update README.md with clear mission statement at the top
2. Update pyproject.toml description field
3. Ensure docs explain both traditional + AI-powered testing
4. Add examples showing the DebuggAI advantage

**Success Criteria:**
- Anyone reading README understands SystemEval in 30 seconds
- Clear distinction between traditional testing and AI-enhanced testing
- DebuggAI integration is positioned as the core differentiator

title: Consolidate validation logic into unified framework
description:
Validation logic is currently scattered across multiple files:
- e2e/validation.py (560 lines) - E2E config validation
- config.py - Pydantic field_validators and model_validators throughout
- Various adapters have their own validation

No unified validation framework, making it hard to:
- Reuse validation logic
- Test validation rules
- Provide consistent error messages
- Add cross-field validation

Proposed approach:
1. Create systemeval/validation/ module with:
   - Base validator classes
   - Common validation rules
   - Error message formatting
2. Refactor config.py to use validation framework
3. Refactor e2e/validation.py to use validation framework
4. Extract adapter validation to shared rules

Benefits:
- DRY principle applied to validation
- Consistent error messages
- Easier to test
- Reusable validation rules

title: Review & decompose PipelineAdapter (1440 lines, 25 methods)
description:
systemeval/systemeval/adapters/pipeline_adapter.py is 1440 lines with a single class containing 25 methods. This violates SRP and makes the adapter hard to maintain and test.

Key issues:
- Single class with 25 methods (lines: __init__, _setup_django, validate_environment, discover, execute, _find_project, _trigger_webhook, _check_run_status, _handle_completion, _calculate_backoff, _log_polling_progress, _cleanup_internal_metadata, _poll_for_completion, _collect_build_metrics, _collect_container_metrics, _collect_pipeline_metrics, _collect_kg_metrics, _collect_surfer_metrics, _collect_e2e_metrics, _collect_metrics, _metrics_pass, _get_failure_message, _evaluate_project, create_evaluation_result)
- Hardcoded CRITERIA dict (see systemeval-xq1)
- Mixes concerns: webhook triggering, polling, metric collection (6 types), evaluation, result creation

Needs decomposition similar to config.py/cli.py/executor.py:
- Extract metric collectors into separate classes/module
- Extract webhook/polling logic into orchestrator
- Extract evaluation logic
- Keep adapter thin (just orchestration)

Related to systemeval-xq1 (extract hardcoded criteria) but broader scope.

title: Implement CLI --project flag for selective execution
description: Add --project=name flag to systemeval test command. Support multiple: --project=backend --project=app. Validate against configured subprojects.

title: Reduce EvaluationResult schema complexity
description: EvaluationResult mixes concerns: metrics, metadata, timing. Separate into composable schemas. Reduce LOC in evaluation.py (11,488 LOC).

title: Split monolithic SystemEval CLI
description: systemeval/systemeval/cli.py is ~1846 lines and handles CLI parsing, multi-project selection, browser setup, and runner orchestration in one file—makes reasoning/testing hard and dominates the module. Break it into smaller command/runner modules (command parser vs orchestrator vs printer) to align with basic design principles.

title: Simplify e2e/validation.py validator class
description:
Current e2e/validation.py is 560 lines with single massive E2EConfigValidator class:
- ~40+ validation rules bundled together
- Validation rules, constants, error messages, provider-specific logic all mixed
- Nesting depth: 5
- Hard to test individual validation rules

Proposed split:
e2e/core/validation/
  ├── __init__.py
  ├── base.py (base validator interface)
  ├── debuggai_validator.py (DebuggAI-specific rules)
  ├── local_validator.py (local provider rules)
  ├── framework_validator.py (framework compatibility)
  └── composite_validator.py (orchestrates all validators)

Benefits:
- Single responsibility per validator
- Easy to add new provider validators
- Testable validation rules
- Clear error messages per concern
close_reason: Completed as part of Phase 2 refactoring (adapters and e2e reorganization)

title: [EPIC] Testing Infrastructure for Multi-Project
Implement JSON output for CI with subproject details
description: JSON schema with verdict, subprojects array containing name/adapter/passed/failed/status/failures. Support --json flag.

- 2 tests in tests/integration/test_debuggai_errors.py (timeout, git command errors)

Fix needed:

title: Extract Jinja2 templates from defaults.py to .jinja2 files
description: defaults.py (485 LOC) contains large string literals for templates. Move to separate .jinja2 files in templates/ directory for better maintainability.

title: Add unit tests for VitestAdapter
description: Test vitest command generation, JSON output parsing, coverage report handling, error scenarios.

title: Review debugg-ai integration changes
description: Review /Users/quinnosha/Documents/Github/debugg-ai/full-platform/sentinal first to understand the latest API wiring before planning/importing the Debugg-AI CLI changes.

title: Add integration tests for multi-project execution
description: Test running multiple subprojects in sequence, aggregated results, --project flag filtering, exit code behavior.

title: Implement per-project systemeval.yaml resolution
description: Config resolution order: subproject's own yaml > root subprojects[name] > root defaults. Requires recursive config loading.

title: Add CLI tests for new --project and --tags flags
description: Test argument parsing, validation against configured subprojects, error messages for invalid project names.

title: Add unit tests for v2.0 config schema parsing
description: Test subprojects array parsing, defaults inheritance, per-project yaml resolution, config validation errors.

title: Reorganize environments/ directory for clarity
description:
Current environments/ has 11 files with unclear separation:
- executor.py (1,394 lines) - already has bead systemeval-0gj
- executor_patterns.py, executor_models.py split across 3 files
- Environment implementations not grouped
- Base class separate from subclasses

Proposed structure:
environments/
  ├── __init__.py
  ├── base.py (keep as is)
  ├── resolver.py (keep as is)
  ├── executor/
  │   ├── __init__.py
  │   ├── executor.py (main TestExecutor)
  │   ├── patterns.py (parser patterns)
  │   ├── models.py (ExecutionResult, etc)
  │   └── strategies/
  │       ├── result_parser.py
  │       └── stream_handler.py
  └── implementations/
      ├── __init__.py
      ├── browser.py
      ├── composite.py
      ├── docker_compose.py
      ├── standalone.py
      └── ngrok.py

Benefits:
- Groups related executor files
- Clear hierarchy for environment types
- Easier to navigate
- Related to systemeval-0gj (decompose executor)

title: Audit architecture + magic constants in large modules
description: Review files such as systemeval/systemeval/adapters/pipeline_adapter.py and other sprawling modules for magic strings/numbers, confusing blocks, and single-responsibility violations and log follow-up work.

title: Split SystemEval config module
description: systemeval/systemeval/config.py is ~1119 lines and hosts every Pydantic model + resolver for v1 and v2 configs. Its size makes it hard to find specific validators and introduces tight coupling between config types. Split models (subprojects, adapters, envs) into dedicated modules and limit resolver logic to a thin orchestrator to satisfy single-responsibility requirements.

title: Add unit tests for JestAdapter
description: Test jest command generation, JSON output parsing, coverage handling. Share fixtures with VitestAdapter tests where possible.

title: Add VitestAdapter for TypeScript/JavaScript
description: New adapter for Vitest framework: npx vitest run, JSON reporter parsing, coverage support. Model after PlaywrightAdapter pattern.

title: Split types.py into domain-specific modules
description:
Current types.py is 692 lines with 14 data classes mixing multiple concerns:
- Adapter configuration (AdapterConfig)
- Test execution options (8 different *Options classes)
- Test results (TestResult, TestItem, TestFailure)
- Generic result wrapper (Result[T, E])
- Verdict enum

Single 'types' file for entire framework violates SRP.

Proposed split:
types/
  ├── __init__.py (re-exports for backward compatibility)
  ├── adapters.py (AdapterConfig)
  ├── options.py (TestSelectionOptions, ExecutionOptions, OutputOptions, PipelineOptions, BrowserOptions, MultiProjectOptions, TestCommandOptions)
  ├── results.py (TestResult, TestItem, TestFailure)
  └── common.py (Verdict enum, Result[T, E])

Benefits:
- Clear separation of concerns
- Easier to find specific type definitions
- Can evolve independently
- Better import clarity

title: [EPIC] Architecture Review & Code Simplification
Simplify adapter constructor backward compatibility
description: All adapters accept Union[AdapterConfig, str, Path] for backward compat. Standardize on AdapterConfig only, add migration helper, remove legacy parameter extraction from __init__ methods.

title: Reorganize e2e/ directory to separate concerns
description:
Current e2e/ has 10 files with mixed responsibilities:
- __init__.py is 348-line facade (should be <50 lines)
- Factory, registry, protocols all handle provider management
- Data models mixed with logic
- No clear data flow

Issues:
1. Duplicated registration logic in registry.py and factory.py
2. types.py (553 lines) contains data classes + conversion logic
3. storage.py (691 lines) mixes artifact storage, metadata, changelog, symlinks
4. validation.py (560 lines) single massive validator class

Proposed structure:
e2e/
  ├── __init__.py (only re-exports, <50 lines)
  ├── core/ (types, protocols, config, validator)
  ├── providers/ (registry, factory, base, debuggai/)
  ├── analysis/ (git_analyzer.py)
  ├── storage/ (artifact_storage, metadata_manager, changeset_manager)
  └── reporting/ (reporter, formatters, results)

Benefits:
- Clear responsibility boundaries
- Single source of truth for provider registry
- Testable components
- Reduces coupling

title: Enhance PytestAdapter for Django (pytest-django)
description: Extend existing PytestAdapter to handle DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE injection, --ds flag, and Django-specific fixtures. Avoid creating separate adapter if possible.

title: Plan Debugg-AI CLI + SystemEval sample integration
description: Document the steps, dependencies, and design rules for integrating Debugg-AI CLI with the Next.js sample and the sentinel crawl/E2E APIs.

title: Split e2e/storage.py into focused modules
description:
Current e2e/storage.py is 691 lines mixing multiple concerns:
- Artifact storage
- Metadata management  
- Changelog handling
- Symlink management
- File system operations
- JSON serialization
- Error handling

Single file violates SRP and makes testing difficult.

Proposed split:
e2e/storage/
  ├── __init__.py
  ├── artifact_storage.py (core storage abstraction)
  ├── metadata_manager.py (metadata read/write)
  ├── changeset_manager.py (changelog handling)
  └── layout.py (directory structure utilities)

Benefits:
- Single responsibility per file
- Easier to test in isolation
- Clear API boundaries
- Can evolve independently
close_reason: Completed as part of Phase 2 refactoring (adapters and e2e reorganization)

title: Implement aggregated multi-project result reporting
description: Unified summary table showing all subprojects: name, adapter, passed, failed, status. Rich table output. Calculate totals and overall verdict.

title: Test debugg-ai CLI flow against Next.js sample
Reorganize adapters/ directory with logical grouping
description:
Current structure is flat with 10 files mixed together:
- No logical grouping (JS adapters mixed with Python/browser)
- Hidden duplication between jest/vitest
- pipeline_adapter.py is 3x larger, uses different patterns

Proposed structure:
adapters/
  ├── base.py, registry.py, repositories.py
  ├── js/
  │   ├── jest_adapter.py
  │   └── vitest_adapter.py
  ├── python/
  │   ├── pytest_adapter.py
  │   └── pipeline/
  │       ├── adapter.py
  │       ├── evaluator.py
  │       ├── validator.py
  │       └── result_builder.py
  └── browser/
      ├── playwright_adapter.py
      └── surfer_adapter.py

Benefits:
- Clear separation by language/type
- Makes duplication visible
- Enables shared base classes per category
- Isolates complex pipeline adapter

title: Refactor PipelineAdapter: extract hardcoded criteria to config
description: PipelineAdapter (1,440 LOC) has hardcoded CRITERIA dict. Extract to configurable list in systemeval.yaml. Reduces coupling, enables customization.

title: Add pre_commands execution tests
description: Test pre_commands success/failure handling, error reporting, skip on failure behavior.

title: Audit and remove dead code paths
description: Identify unused functions, unreachable branches, deprecated compatibility code. Target 10-15% LOC reduction across codebase.

title: Add systemeval validate command
description: Validate all subproject configs, check adapter availability, verify paths exist, detect circular dependencies.

title: Simplify environment executor orchestration
description: executor.py (986 LOC) handles setup→health→test→teardown. Review for duplication with composite environment logic. Consider state machine pattern.
